preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 150 g of magnesium, 250 g of ruthenium, 50 g of silicon, and 100 g of zinc using an accurate scale.
2. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine all the measured ingredients thoroughly using a spatula or mixing tool. Ensure uniform distribution of all materials. 
3. Transfer the mixed powder into a suitable mold shaped to 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
